cause.description:
In the United States alone, there are over 20,000 registered pugs. They are everywhere, and they need our help. Diego's kids is a charity that seeks to take the first steps to help. Our goal? We hope to make Botox freely available to all pugs. This is only the first step, a real solution will take years. But we offer hope. One injection at a time.
1. Pugs are wrinkly.
2. It's not their fault.
3. You can help.
cause.name: Diego's Kids
